name: Sheri A Tell
comment: Thought this lettuce was pre-washed, but it wasn’t.  Washing and drying each lettuce leaf is labor intensive.  I prefer lettuce that’s ready to be used right from the package.
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2020

name: DeeLuv
comment: I am following a low carb lifestyle and don't eat bread. I had a turkey burger and they were the perfect size for the burger.  I am also going to try this with tuna & chicken salad.
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2019

name: Eugene
comment: We love the taste of this salad and the fact that it's created in a greenhouse means it's available all year round! It's fantastic to put in salads, burgers and anything else you would want lettuce. This lettuce is not bitter at all and has a nice richness flavor to it. This is the only one we always buy!
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2020

name: Val K
comment: This was very good, crispy, nice large pieces (separated but not washed), and flavorful.  Will buy this again!
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2020

name: o
comment: IMO this is SO much better than the butter lettuce I get from the grocery store. I've gotten it delivered with Amazon Fresh twice and both times it was so fresh and delicious. It remained fresh and tasty the entire 4 days or so it took my daughter and I to eat both boxes. Good purchase.
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2020

name: Out Of Bounds
comment: Very nice lettuce.  Beautiful, large leaves. You pay extra for this lettuce but it's worth it if You are doing something special.  I made three salads with one container.  Served with artichoke hearts, hearts of palm, Kumato tomatoes and grilled chicken - topped with a lemon vinaigrette.
date: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2020
